page.title: 16Sport/recreation- Biddestone
page.content: There are successful football and cricket clubs who play at their Cuttle Lane ground. A Sports Club has recently been formed with plans to improve this ground and to provide a tennis court. At Slaughterford and Giddea Hall where the land is very steep and the pasture is poor, farmers have turned their waste acres over to moto-cross. This is motor cycling racing over a very rough circuit. It has an enthusiastic following for both riders and spectators (except for those who live in the vicinity of the courses and their loudspeaker systems. There are swimming pools at Corsham, Chippenham (open air) and Bath and sports centres in Chippenham, Melksham and Bath. Tennis courts are available at Corsham School and skittle alleys and darts in many pubs.
